actions.text: On agreeing to the Gilman amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 0, 1 Present (Roll No. 172).

description: Amendment exempts U.S. Armed Forces from restrictions contained in the U.N. Kyoto Climate Change Treaty.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 2 in part B of House Rept. 105-544, to specify that no provision of the Kyoto Protocol will restrict the procurement, training, operation or maintencance of the U.S. Armed Forces.
